About OBS

We are engineers, designers, and product strategists obsessed with outcomes.

Since 2011 OBS has been partnering with founders, Fortune 500 enterprises, and public sector teams to build reliable software faster. We believe that the strongest products come from multidisciplinary teams, transparent collaboration, and relentless iteration.

Mission

Empower teams to launch high-quality digital products with confidence. We do this by combining human-centered design, modern engineering practices, and DevOps excellence.

Values

  • Integrity: Build trust with transparency and ownership.
  • Craft: Sweat the details that elevate experiences.
  • Momentum: Deliver value in every sprint.
  • Learning: Evolve with curiosity and continuous improvement.

Leadership

The team guiding every OBS engagement

Maya Collins

Founder & CEO

Oversees product strategy and ensures every OBS engagement aligns with measurable business outcomes for our clients.

Leonardo Ortiz

Chief Technology Officer

Leads our engineering practice with a focus on modern cloud architecture, security, and high-performing delivery teams.

Priya Desai

Director of Product Design

Champions research-driven design and accessible interfaces that users love to adopt and recommend.

Our Engagement Model

Every OBS engagement begins with discovery to de-risk assumptions and map user journeys. We then allocate a dedicated team with the right mix of strategists, UX experts, engineers, QA, and DevOps to deliver iteratively. Weekly demos, shared metrics, and transparent tooling keep stakeholders aligned.

Engineering Partnerships

We are proud Firebase partners and have delivered dozens of real-time applications across industries. Our expertise spans serverless backends, automated testing, and multi-cloud deployments using Google Cloud, AWS, and Azure.

Join the team

We are always looking for engineers, designers, and delivery leads who love solving complex product challenges. Remote-first with collaborative hubs across North America and Europe.
